system.name: Pack Master
system.effect: For you and your Pokémon with Teamwork, Teamwork’s effect now reads “While you are adjacent to an opponent, allies targeting that opponent receive a +2 bonus to Accuracy Checks”. Whenever you or your Pokémon successfully hit a foe with Pack Hunt, they gain a +2 Bonus to Accuracy Rolls and a +5 Bonus to Damage Rolls against that foe until the end of their next turn.
system.prerequisites: Pack Tactics, Expert Stealth, Expert Survival
